person.persName: Andrew Gregg Curtin (Pennsylvania attorney and governor)

body.p: Pennsylvania attorney and governor. Bellafonte, Pennsylvania, native. Studied in the preparatory schools of Milton, Pennsylvania. Graduated from Dickinson College (Pa.) in 1837. Admitted to the bar in 1837. Attorney in Bellafonte. Whig Party presidential elector in 1848 and 1852. Secretary of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania. Superintendent of Public Instruction. Governor of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania from 1861 to 1867.
